relation: The campus is pretty tight and safe. We all watch out for each other. There is also security that walks around.
There is something for everyone. Whether it be academic like with physics or engineering club or involvement like with the LGBT group or the veterans club there are LOTS of ways to be involved.
Tuition is pretty high at $46 for fall 2012. It has increase every semester I have been there so far! from 26 to 46 dollars
The sandwiches are really good! but overall the selection isn't to bad, unless your trying to be healthy then you're stuck with salad or sandwiches.
The general classes aren't bad, but if you take the higher up math or science then make it four or five stars.

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students Be ready to learn, choose your classes carefully, and enjoy your time here because time passes by so quickly. Am enjoying being here I have made great friends, the staff is friendly, and the student area is very comfortable to be in. Am learning a lot Since I started attending Hartnell, I have only had the best instructors who love what they do, and share it.
